page.title: 20ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS
page.content: Miss J Cockburn and Miss N Davies would like to thank the following people for their help in the compiling of the Little Baddow section of the Domesday project: 11Girls and 12Girls of Moulsham High School for both the collection and writing of material. Mrs M Attewell and Mrs U Lawton of Moulsham High School History department for their local history knowledge. Mr D Massey of the Art department for the photographs. Mr A Jones for his advice and help in the computer room, and Mr P Gibbon for the use of the school computer. Mr R Kerr for the geology contributions, and Mr H Andrews the Headmaster for permiting us to participate in this Project. Finally we would like to extend our thanks to the people of Little Baddow.
